test.name: Should send keys to search box and then check the value

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Hello world!' into text field 'txt_query_prefill'

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'android:id/search_src_text' contains exactly text 'Hello world!'.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

kw.doc: Retrieves the current activity on the device.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Expect Error
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and checks that the expected error occurred.

kw.name: Get Activity
kw.doc: Retrieves the current activity on the device.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.
